name: wildcat 6.54x42mm
description: Inspired by the improved .270, Alexander Sarafanov himself developed the 6.54x42mm rifle cartridge for his new SVS-24 Assault Rifle.  This one has been handloaded with a jacketed soft point bullet.

name: reloaded 6.54x42mm
description: Inspired by the improved .270, Alexander Sarafanov himself developed the 6.54x42mm rifle cartridge for his new SVS-24 Assault Rifle.  This one has been handloaded.
